welcome_message_body: Welcome to Nampa, where small-town charm meets big-city amenities. Known for its beautiful parks, vibrant downtown, and friendly locals, we invite you to explore everything this lovely city has to offer and make unforgettable memories during your stay.

restaurants.description: Brick 29 is a new american restaurant located in Nampa.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is the primary concourse for domestic flights at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is the secondary concourse for domestic flights at Boise Air Terminal/Gowen Field Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport.
